item.description:
Join us September 21st from 5-8pm to celebrate United Nations International Day of Peace!

The celebration will be held in Framingham on the village common on Edgell Road from 5-8 pm and will include a peace march, refreshments, video presentation, live music, activities for peace intentions, and a candlelight vigil. As you can see from the UN website below, this event in Framingham represents just one of many such events across the globe to celebrate and support this UN sanctioned peace day.

http://www.internatio....

Bring your kids, your neighbors and your friends - everyone who desires a little more peace in this world. We hope to see you there!
item.name: United Nations International Day of Peace Celebration
